````javascript
// ...existing code...

    cardinal: {
        name: "Cardinal",
        icon: {
            type: "image",
            url: "https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/growagarden/images/d/d2/Cardinal.png",
            fallback: "🐦"
        },
        type: "bird",
        rarity: "Common",
        source: "Enchanted Chest",
        probability: 34.5,
        obtainable: true,
        description: "All magical type plants grow faster",
        calculate: (kg, modifierType = "none") => {
            if (!Utils.isValidWeight(kg)) return "Invalid weight";
            
            const { value: modifier, text: modifierText, style: modifierStyle } = getModifierDetails(modifierType);
            
            const baseMultiplier = 1.5;
            const baseRange = 30;
            const multiplier = Math.min(4, baseMultiplier + (0.05 * kg));
            const range = baseRange; // No scaling based on provided data
            
            const multiplierMod = baseMultiplier * modifier;
            const multiplierTotal = Math.min(4, multiplier + multiplierMod);
            
            const displayText = modifier > 0 ? ` <span style='${modifierStyle}'>${modifierText}</span>` : "";
            
            return `All Magical type plants within <strong>${range}</strong> studs grow <strong>${multiplierTotal.toFixed(2)}x</strong> faster${displayText}!`;
        },
        perKgImpact: () => "Each additional kg increases magical growth multiplier by 0.05x (max 4x)"
    },

    shroomie: {
        name: "Shroomie",
        icon: {
            type: "image",
            url: "https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/growagarden/images/f/ff/Shoomie.png",
            fallback: "🍄"
        },
        type: "plant",
        rarity: "Legendary",
        source: "Enchanted Chest",
        probability: 14.5,
        obtainable: true,
        description: "Provides size bonuses based on fungus type plants in garden",
        calculate: (kg, modifierType = "none") => {
            if (!Utils.isValidWeight(kg)) return "Invalid weight";
            
            const { value: modifier, text: modifierText, style: modifierStyle } = getModifierDetails(modifierType);
            
            const baseRange = 14.75;
            const baseMultiplier = 0.004;
            const range = Math.min(40, baseRange + (0.25 * kg));
            const multiplier = Math.min(0.01, baseMultiplier + (0.001 * kg));
            
            const rangeMod = baseRange * modifier;
            const multiplierMod = baseMultiplier * modifier;
            const rangeTotal = Math.min(40, range + rangeMod);
            const multiplierTotal = Math.min(0.01, multiplier + multiplierMod);
            
            const displayText = modifier > 0 ? ` <span style='${modifierStyle}'>${modifierText}</span>` : "";
            
            return `All plants within <strong>${rangeTotal.toFixed(2)}</strong> studs have increased <strong>${(multiplierTotal * 100).toFixed(3)}%</strong> size bonus for every Fungus type plant in your garden (Max 300)${displayText}!`;
        },
        perKgImpact: () => "Each additional kg increases range by 0.25 studs (max 40) and multiplier by 0.001 (max 0.01)"
    },

    phoenix: {
        name: "Phoenix",
        icon: {
            type: "image",
            url: "https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/growagarden/images/c/c1/Phoenix.png",
            fallback: "🔥"
        },
        type: "mythical",
        rarity: "Divine",
        source: "Enchanted Chest",
        probability: 1,
        obtainable: true,
        description: "Dual ability: Grants age bonuses to pets from mutation machine and applies Flaming mutations",
        calculate: (kg, modifierType = "none") => {
            if (!Utils.isValidWeight(kg)) return "Invalid weight";
            
            const { value: modifier, text: modifierText, style: modifierStyle } = getModifierDetails(modifierType);
            
            // First ability - Age bonus
            const baseAgeBonus = 4.8;
            const ageBonus = Math.min(9, baseAgeBonus + (0.1 * kg));
            
            // Second ability - Flaming mutation
            const baseCooldown = 1200;
            const baseChance = 20;
            const baseAmount = 4;
            const cooldown = Math.max(400, baseCooldown - (6.5 * kg));
            const chance = Math.min(40, baseChance + (0.2 * kg));
            const amount = Math.min(8, baseAmount + (0.1 * kg));
            
            // Apply modifiers
            const ageBonusMod = baseAgeBonus * modifier;
            const cooldownMod = baseCooldown * modifier;
            const chanceMod = baseChance * modifier;
            const amountMod = baseAmount * modifier;
            
            const ageBonusTotal = Math.min(9, ageBonus + ageBonusMod);
            const adjustedBaseCooldown = baseCooldown - cooldownMod;
            const cooldownTotal = Math.max(400, adjustedBaseCooldown - (6.5 * kg));
            const chanceTotal = Math.min(40, chance + chanceMod);
            const amountTotal = Math.min(8, amount + amountMod);
            
            const displayText = modifier > 0 ? ` <span style='${modifierStyle}'>${modifierText}</span>` : "";
            
            return `<strong>Dual Ability:</strong><br>Pets from the mutation machine get <strong>1-${ageBonusTotal.toFixed(1)}</strong> bonus age!<br>Every <strong>${Utils.formatTime(cooldownTotal)}</strong>, travels between <strong>${amountTotal.toFixed(1)}</strong> random fruits applying Flaming mutation! Fruits passed have <strong>${chanceTotal.toFixed(1)}%</strong> chance to mutate as well${displayText}!`;
        },
        perKgImpact: () => "Each additional kg decreases cooldown by 6.5s (min 6:40), increases mutation chance by 0.2% (max 40%), increases targets by 0.1 (max 8), and increases age bonus by 0.1 (max 9)"
    },

    wisp: {
        name: "Wisp",
        icon: {
            type: "image",
            url: "https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/growagarden/images/e/e7/Wisp.png",
            fallback: "👻"
        },
        type: "mythical",
        rarity: "Legendary",
        source: "Fairy Fares Shop",
        probability: 0,
        obtainable: true,
        description: "Grants XP bonuses to all pets when Wisp Well is present",
        calculate: (kg, modifierType = "none") => {
            if (!Utils.isValidWeight(kg)) return "Invalid weight";
            
            const { value: modifier, text: modifierText, style: modifierStyle } = getModifierDetails(modifierType);
            
            const baseAmount = 0.64;
            const amount = Math.min(6.5, baseAmount + (0.1 * kg));
            
            const amountMod = baseAmount * modifier;
            const amountTotal = Math.min(6.5, amount + amountMod);
            
            const displayText = modifier > 0 ? ` <span style='${modifierStyle}'>${modifierText}</span>` : "";
            
            return `As long as you have a Wisp Well in your garden: The Wisp will go to it to grant all other pets an additional <strong>${amountTotal.toFixed(2)} XP/s</strong>${displayText}!`;
        },
        perKgImpact: () => "Each additional kg increases XP bonus by 0.1 XP/s (max 6.5)"
    },

    drake: {
        name: "Drake",
        icon: {
            type: "image",
            url: "https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/growagarden/images/d/da/Drake.png",
            fallback: "🐉"
        },
        type: "mythical",
        rarity: "Mythical",
        source: "Fairy Fares Shop",
        probability: 0,
        obtainable: true,
        description: "Breathes fire on cooking kits to boost cooking speed",
        calculate: (kg, modifierType = "none") => {
            if (!Utils.isValidWeight(kg)) return "Invalid weight";
            
            const { value: modifier, text: modifierText, style: modifierStyle } = getModifierDetails(modifierType);
            
            const baseAmount = 0.1;
            const amount = Math.min(0.2, baseAmount + (0.01 * kg));
            
            const amountMod = baseAmount * modifier;
            const amountTotal = Math.min(0.2, amount + amountMod);
            
            const displayText = modifier > 0 ? ` <span style='${modifierStyle}'>${modifierText}</span>` : "";
            
            return `Goes to any active Cooking Kit and breathes fire on it, boosting cooking speed by <strong>${(amountTotal * 100).toFixed(1)}%</strong>${displayText}!`;
        },
        perKgImpact: () => "Each additional kg increases cooking speed boost by 1% (max 20%)"
    },
